articles.title: A pointless fashion trend or something else? Chimpanzees wear blades of grass in their ears and rears - Phys.org
articles.description: A team of researchers from Utrecht University, Durham University, and other institutions have observed something remarkable at a chimpanzee sanctuary in Zambia. Several chimpanzees from one particular group were seen dangling blades of grass from their ear ho…
